ANDS-Grants.description: The tax bonus payments of the $42 billion Nation Building and Jobs Plan were among the largest fiscal policy packages in the developed world. This project applies a new methodology to estimate the short-term impact of this cash handout on consumer spending, allowing better modelling of the Australian economy.
ANDS-Grants.title: Estimating the impact of fiscal stimulus on household expenditure
